name: Shadow Forest (Myrtax, FrostMagus, Bibi_Patrocinio, Notrya147, Clara, rewumi)
name_original: Shadow Forest (Myrtax, FrostMagus, Bibi_Patrocinio, Notrya147, Clara, rewumi)
description:
Shadow Forest (Myrtax, FrostMagus, Bibi_Patrocinio, Notrya147, Clara, rewumi) is an adventure-platformer game developed by Clara, rewumi, Myrtax and FrostMagus. It came out on 11-07-2021.
You can play Shadow Forest (Myrtax, FrostMagus, Bibi_Patrocinio, Notrya147, Clara, rewumi) on PC, macOS and Linux. The game is sold via itch.io.
